hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
if [ ! -f Platform_FVP_Corstone_SSE-300_Ethos-U55/Objects/microspeech.axf ]; then echo "Executable not found" exit 1 fi
sudo apt install -y ffmpeg
# Environment variables export PATH=$PATH:/opt/armcompiler/bin export PATH=$PATH:/opt/gcc-arm-none-eabi-10-2020-q4-major/bin export PATH=$PATH:/opt/FVP_ARM_Std_Library/FVP_MPS2 export PATH=$PATH:/opt/FVP_Corstone_SSE-300/models/Linux64_GCC-6.4 export CMSIS_PACK_ROOT=/home/ubuntu/packs export CMSIS_COMPILER_ROOT=/opt/cbuild/etc export CMSIS_BUILD_ROOT=/opt/cbuild/bin export PATH=/opt/cbuild/bin:$PATH export ARMLMD_LICENSE_FILE=/opt/data.dat export PATH=$PATH:/opt/VHT export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/opt/VHT export ARMCOMPILER6_CLANGOPT=-Wno-license-management export ARMCOMPILER6_LINKOPT=--diag_suppress=9931 export ARMCOMPILER6_FROMELFOPT=--diag_suppress=9931 export ARMCOMPILER6_ASMOPT=--diag_suppress=9931
# For unit tests git clone https://github.com/manolo/shell2junit.git . ./shell2junit/sh2ju.sh
cd Platform_FVP_Corstone_SSE-300_Ethos-U55/
# 1 run out of 2, run with different input rand=$(od -A n -t d -N 1 /dev/urandom) # between 1 and 256 if [ 1 -eq "$(echo "$rand < 64" | bc)" ]; then echo "Truncate data set to 10s" ffmpeg -ss 0 -i test.wav -to 10 -c copy -copyts out.wav mv test.wav orig.wav mv out.wav test.wav else if [ 1 -eq "$(echo "$rand < 128" | bc)" ]; then echo "Truncate data set to 19s" ffmpeg -ss 0 -i test.wav -to 19 -c copy -copyts out.wav mv test.wav orig.wav mv out.wav test.wav fi fi
# 2 run out of 3, run with different simulation times/workloads rand=$(od -A n -t d -N 1 /dev/urandom) # between 1 and 256 if [ 1 -eq "$(echo "$rand > 170" | bc)" ]; then echo "Reduce simulation time to 1800000000 cycles" VHT_Corstone_SSE-300_Ethos-U55 -V "../VSI/audio/python" -f fvp_config.txt -a Objects/microspeech.axf --stat --cyclelimit 1800000000 2>&1 | tee output.log else if [ 1 -eq "$(echo "$rand < 80" | bc)" ]; then echo "Run another workload in the background" ./run_example.sh & ./run_example.sh & ./run_example.sh & ./run_example.sh 2>&1 | tee output.log else ./run_example.sh 2>&1 | tee output.log fi fi
echo "Processing results"
# clean old reports juLogClean # test report check_output () { # $1-string #check if $1 is found in output.log if grep -q "${1}" output.log; then return 0 else return 1 fi }
juLog -name=yes1 check_output "Heard yes (146) @1000ms" juLog -name=no1 check_output "Heard no (145) @5600ms" juLog -name=yes2 check_output "Heard yes (143) @9100ms" juLog -name=no2 check_output "Heard no (145) @13600ms" juLog -name=yes3 check_output "Heard yes (143) @17100ms" juLog -name=no3 check_output "Heard no (145) @21600ms"
# check performance # performance report check_perf () { # $1-string #return value of $1 in output.log value=`cat output.log | grep "${1}" | awk -F": " '{print substr($2, 1, length($2)-1)}'` } echo '"Simulated time", "Wall time"' > simulation.csv check_perf "Simulated time" simt=$value check_perf "Wall time" walt=$value echo "$simt, $walt" >> simulation.csv
echo '"User time", "System time"' > system.csv check_perf "User time" usrt=$value check_perf "System time" syst=$value echo "$usrt, $syst" >> system.csv
echo '"Performance index"' > perf.csv check_perf "Performance index" perf=$value echo "$perf" >> perf.csv
exit 0
